hero.title: Custom Websites Tailored to Your Business Needs
hero.subtitle: Emphasizing scalability, responsiveness, and performance

mobileResponsive.name: Mobile Responsive Design
mobileResponsive.description: We create mobile-friendly designs that ensure your website looks great and functions perfectly on all devices.

seoFriendly.name: SEO-Friendly Development
seoFriendly.description: Our websites are optimized for search engines, helping you rank higher and attract more organic traffic.

cms.name: Easy-to-Manage CMS
cms.description: We integrate user-friendly CMS platforms, empowering you to update and manage your website effortlessly.

speedOptimization.name: Speed Optimization
speedOptimization.description: We implement advanced optimization techniques to enhance your website's speed and performance.

userExperience.name: Enhanced User Experience
userExperience.description: We deliver intuitive and engaging websites designed to provide seamless navigation and a superior user experience.

loadingTimes.name: Faster Loading Times
loadingTimes.description: Our development process ensures optimized loading speeds, improving user retention and satisfaction.

scalability.name: Scalability for Future Growth
scalability.description: We build scalable solutions that grow with your business, ensuring your website remains robust as traffic increases.

support.name: Dedicated Post-Launch Support
support.description: Our team provides ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your website stays secure, updated, and functional.

analysis.title: Requirement Analysis
analysis.description: Collaborate to understand objectives, challenges, and goals. This ensures alignment with your website vision from the beginning.

wireframing.title: Wireframing & Prototyping
wireframing.description: Translate ideas into structured plans with prototypes to visualize the final website and ensure strategic clarity.

development.title: Development
development.description: Transform concepts into a fully functional website with seamless design and robust development for optimal performance.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: Conduct rigorous testing to ensure your website is free of issues, optimized, and ready for seamless launch.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: Deploy the website with precision and provide post-launch support to keep it running smoothly and effectively.

solulec.name: Solulec-Web App Development
solulec.content: This web application is used to check eligibility for energy aid provided by French government.
solulec.design: UI/UX design with Figma and Tailwind CSS
solulec.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

private.name: Website Development
private.content: Private Honors is revolutionizing travel. Save on every booking by getting cashback, manage travel with ease and enjoy VIP customer service. Discover a new way to travel, smarter and more profitable.
private.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express
private.design: UI/UX Design with Figma and Tailwind CSS

wiefly.name: Green Ackors- Wordpress
wiefly.content: Green Ackors offers different types of services related to landscaping and irrigation.
wiefly.frontendDevelopment: This website has been built with wordpress.

hosting.question: Do you provide website hosting services?
hosting.answer: While we don't directly host websites, we can assist you in selecting and setting up reliable hosting solutions like AWS, Bluehost, or SiteGround.

redesign.question: Can you redesign my existing website?
redesign.answer: Absolutely. We offer website redesign services to improve aesthetics, functionality, and performance while maintaining your brand identity.

content.question: Do you provide content for websites?
content.answer: Yes, we offer content creation services, including copywriting, SEO-optimized content, and multimedia content for your website.

seo.question: Will my website be optimized for search engines?
seo.answer: Yes, all websites we develop are SEO-friendly, ensuring faster indexing and improved search engine rankings.

maintenance.question: Do you offer maintenance and updates after the website launch?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch support, including regular updates, security patches, and performance monitoring to keep your website running smoothly.

training.question: Can you provide training on how to manage my website?
training.answer: Yes, we provide training sessions and user guides to help you manage your website efficiently using the CMS or other tools we've implemented.

multilingual.question: Do you support multilingual websites?
multilingual.answer: Yes, we can develop websites with multilingual support, allowing you to reach a global audience effectively.
